name: Fiendling: Realization
description:
Reality is compassionate — this battle is like the Great Yaoshi extending a fragile spider's thread to a fiendling on the brink of death, stopping just short of going too far
※ In the Moment of Slumbernana, defeat a small number of Slumbernana Monkeys
hiddenDescription: Reality is compassionate — this battle is like the Great Yaoshi extending a fragile spider's thread to a fiendling on the brink of death, stopping just short of going too far
